description: Gets the token balance for a batch of tokens by using the BatchGetTokenBalance action for every token in the request.

parameters.name: getTokenBalanceInputs
parameters.description: An array of BatchGetTokenBalanceInputItem objects whose balance is being requested. (dict) --- The container for the input for getting a token balance. tokenIdentifier (dict) --- The container for the identifier for the token including the unique token ID and its blockchain network. network (string) --- The blockchain network of the token. contractAddress (string) --- This is the token's contract address. tokenId (string) --- The unique identifier of the token. ownerIdentifier (dict) --- The container for the owner identifier. address (string) --- The contract or wallet address for the owner. atBlockchainInstant (dict) --- The container for time. time (datetime) --- The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_items.name: tokenBalances
nested_items.description: An array of BatchGetTokenBalanceOutputItem objects returned by the response.

nested_items.name: ownerIdentifier
nested_items.description: The container for the owner identifier.

nested_items.name: address
nested_items.description: The contract or wallet address for the owner.

nested_items.name: tokenIdentifier
nested_items.description: The container for the identifier for the token including the unique token ID and its blockchain network.

nested_items.name: network
nested_items.description: The blockchain network of the token.

nested_items.name: contractAddress
nested_items.description: This is the token's contract address.

nested_items.name: tokenId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the token.

nested_items.name: balance
nested_items.description: The container for the token balance.

nested_items.name: atBlockchainInstant
nested_items.description: The container for time.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The container for time.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: An array of BatchGetTokenBalanceErrorItem objects returned from the request.
